GET /api.description: returns a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: returns an array of all topics

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: returns an article object by the article ID

GET /api/articles.description: returns an array of all article objects

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: returns an array of comment objects for the given article ID

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: posts a comment to a given article ID and returns the posted comment object
